授業方法:
Classes will combine on-line simultaneous and interactive class sessions with Zoom and two on-demand assigned task sessions. Students are expected to participate the first session of the course, so that we can discuss the format and contents of the course held in the quarter. Lectures, case studies and class discussions with student group presentations will be planned for the course.
Please refer to LUNA 3 days before the first session, check class announcements and review a more detailed version of syllabus along with your learning materials.
We will use LUNA for exchange of documents, and students are expected to submit assignments via LUNA.

第2回: New Business Environment;Why does corporate scandals still exist?; Organizational Characteristics of business organization
第4回: How Ethics Informs Business Decision-Making; Preparing for an Era of Crises
第5回: Making Decisions and Communicating in an Era of Crises(1): Defining a Crisis; Types of Crises
第6回: Making Decisions and Communicating in an Era of Crises(2): Risk Management: Preparing for the Worst
第7回: Making Decisions and Communicating in an Era of Crises(2):Crisis Communication-The Basics
第8回: Managing Crises of the Physical Environment(1): Natural Crises; Biological Crises
第9回: Managing Crises of the Physical Environment(2):Technological Crises
第10回: Managing Crises of the Physical Environment(3):Confrontation Crises; Crises of Malevolence
第11回: Managing Crises of Management Failure(1): Crises of Mismanagement
第12回: Managing Crises of Management Failure(2):Crises of Skewed Management Values; Crises of Deception
第13回: Managing Crises of Management Failure(3): Crises of Management Misconduct
第14回: Wrap up: Making Ethical Decisions: Lessons learned from an Era of Crises; Looking Toward the Future
